name: Isang Mahal-Classic Pendant
description:
Isang Mahal, One Love. The classic style pendant that started it all in 1994, and put Malaya Designs on the forefront of Baybayin advocacy for FilAm identity. 

A simple pendant without borders on bamboo. Hand split from harvested bamboo, cut and sized to approximately 1/2" wide by 1 3/4" long. Woodburned with a natural finish. Embellished with a metal bead and sliding adjustable cord.

name: Malakas, Maganda-Classic Pendant
description:

A simple pendant without borders on bamboo. Hand split from harvested bamboo, cut and sized to approximately 1/2" wide by 1 3/4" long. Woodburned with a natural finish. Embellished with a metal bead and sliding adjustable cord.

name: Pamilya Muna
description:
Pamilya Muna, Family First. As with any of my pieces, these pendants have been created with attention to detail. The proper sizing, layout, and hand style of the Baybayin evokes the classic look and feel of Malaya Designs craftsmanship. 

A new direction for Malaya Designs is now available in laser cut, laser engraved wearable art on Bamboo. Each piece is approximately 3/4" wide, 1 1/2" long. Hand finished with a sliding adjustable cord. 

*Please note: Bamboo is much more dense than wood and has a higher resistance to penetration. Depending on the grain of the bamboo, this will result in the laser to either burn lighter or darker on the piece. In some cases, there will be a graduated color difference from either light to dark or vice versa. This is not a defect, but rather the nature of how strong and resilient bamboo is against a laser engraver, which adds character to the piece.

name: Hindi Susuko
description:
Hindi Susuko, I Won't Give Up. As with any of my pieces, these pendants have been created with attention to detail. The proper sizing, layout, and hand style of the Baybayin evokes the classic look and feel of Malaya Designs craftsmanship. 

A new direction for Malaya Designs is now available in laser cut, laser engraved wearable art on Bamboo. Each piece is approximately 3/4" wide, 1 1/2" long. Hand finished with a sliding adjustable cord. 

*Please note: Bamboo is much more dense than wood and has a higher resistance to penetration. Depending on the grain of the bamboo, this will result in the laser to either burn lighter or darker on the piece. In some cases, there will be a graduated color difference from either light to dark or vice versa. This is not a defect, but rather the nature of how strong and resilient bamboo is against a laser engraver, which adds character to the piece.

name: Kapwa-Cutout
description:
"KAPWA", fellow man, shared self. As with any of my pieces, these pendants have been created with attention to detail. The proper sizing, layout, and hand style of the Baybayin evokes the classic look and feel of Malaya Designs craftsmanship. A new direction for Malaya Designs is now available in laser cut, laser engraved wearable art on Walnut wood. 

Each piece is approximately 1" wide, 1 1/2" long. Hand finished with a sliding adjustable cord. Pieces have been hand rubbed with a natural wax to help preserve and bring out the grain of the Walnut wood. The item has a dark finish. 

Proceeds from this pendant will be donated to Typhoon Haiyan relief efforts. Funds will go to a grassroots organization, NAFCON. Your purchase, your funds, will hit the ground running to folks who need it and no government BS.

name: Kapwa-Classic Bordered Bamboo
description:
"KAPWA", shared inner self. Like most of you, I've also struggled over what I can do to help our folks in the RP for typhoon relief. I turned to what I do best, sharing what I do best. Proceeds go to a grassroots organization NAFCON. Your purchase, your funds, will hit the ground running to folks who need it, no government BS.

*These are handcrafted pieces and will vary from one another and the item pictured. Pieces are approximately 5/8" wide and 1" long on Bamboo. Finished with  sliding adjustable cord and metal bead.

name: Philippine Motif Pendant-"Karayan" Flowing Water
description:
A unique piece of wearable art. This handcrafted pendant features the Philippine motif "Karayan", that represents flowing water. It symbolizes life and regeneration. Crafted of Bamboo and wood burned. It measures approximately 1" Wide, 1 1/2" Long. Finished with a wooden bead and sliding adjustable 2mm black cotton cord. 

Note: Due to the nature of the work and material availability, the pendant you receive may vary slightly from the sample. No returns or exchanges.
*US Domestic shipping only.

name: Philippine Motif Pendant-"Minamata", the eyes of the ancestors keeping watch.
description:
A unique piece of wearable art. This handcrafted pendant features the Philippine motif "Minamata", that represents the eyes of the ancestors keeping watch over the wearer. Crafted of Bamboo and wood burned. It measures approximately 1" Wide, 1 1/2" Long. Finished with a wooden bead and sliding adjustable 2mm black cotton cord. 

Note: Due to the nature of the work and material availability, the pendant you receive may vary slightly from the sample. No returns or exchanges.
*US Domestic shipping only.

name: Malaya-Classic Bordered Bamboo
description:
A unique piece of wearable art. This handcrafted pendant features the ancient script of the Philiipines, the Baybayin. It is made of Bamboo, both the inscription and border work is wood burned. It measures approximately 5/8" Wide, 1" Long. Finished with a wooden bead and sliding adjustable 2mm black cotton cord. 

Note: Due to the nature of the work and material availability, the pendant you receive may vary slightly from the sample. No returns or exchanges.
*US Domestic shipping only.

name: Lakas, Strength-Classic Bordered Pendants
description:
A unique piece of wearable art. This handcrafted pendant features the ancient script of the Philiipines, the Baybayin. Available in classic Philippine Narra wood or Bamboo, both the inscription and border work is wood burned. It measures approximately 5/8" Wide, 1" Long. Finished with a wooden bead and sliding adjustable 2mm black cotton cord. 

Note: Due to the nature of the work and material availability, the pendant you receive may vary slightly from the sample. No returns or exchanges.
*US Domestic shipping only.
